trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 代表已排序的集合的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection stores references to items that will be embedded in an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection 會儲存參考會內嵌在電子郵件訊息的項目。

trans-unit.source: The embedded items can be image files such as company logos.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌的項目可以是例如公司標誌的影像檔。

trans-unit.source: The EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.EmbeddedObjects%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.EmbeddedObjects%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.EmbeddedObjects%2A>

trans-unit.source: E-mail messages that allow embedded objects are configurable in the following Web controls by setting their <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> properties declaratively: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> > [!NOTE] > The values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> and EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection objects are not stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 允許的內嵌的物件的電子郵件訊息會藉由設定下列 Web 控制項中可設定其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>屬性以宣告方式:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>> [!NOTE] > 中的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject>和 EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection 物件不是儲存在檢視狀態。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: This protects against malicious users discovering path information for your server.
trans-unit.target: 這可防止惡意使用者探索伺服器的路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref>結尾<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref>中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is .
trans-unit.target: The specified value is .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> contains a specific <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>包含特定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to identify the position of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法來識別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject>在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject>位置</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref>中尋找<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: if the contains obj; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if the contains obj; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> instance beginning at the specified index in the array.
trans-unit.target: 將集合物件複製到一維<xref:System.Array>執行個體陣列中指定索引處開始。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> is the destination of the elements copied from the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>會從目前的複製之元素的目的地<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: 陣列必須有以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 中以零為起始的索引`array`由此開始複製。

trans-unit.source: The specified array is .
trans-unit.target: The specified array is .

trans-unit.source: The specified index is out of range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定 index 超出範圍的集合。

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specific <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 判斷特定索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref>中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> if it exists in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref>如果存在於<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>，否則為-1。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref> object at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: 插入<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref>到<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>物件中位於指定的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: If `index` is 0, `value` is added to the beginning of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`index`為 0，`value`加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>的開頭

trans-unit.source: If `index` equals the number of items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>, `value` is appended to the end.
trans-unit.target: 如果`index`等於中的項目數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>，`value`附加至結尾。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>

trans-unit.source: An integer value that indicates the index position at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 整數值，表示要插入的索引位置<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref>集合中。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> object to insert into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref>物件插入至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified index is out of range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定 index 超出範圍的集合。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is .
trans-unit.target: The specified value is .

trans-unit.source: Returns a specific element of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>, identified by its position.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的特定元素<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>所識別的位置。

trans-unit.source: If `index` does not match an existing member of the collection, an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果`index`不符合現有成員的集合，則會發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The Item property is the default property for a collection.
trans-unit.target: 此項目屬性是集合的預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent: ```vb# myObject = myCollection(index) myObject = myCollection.Item(index) ``` ```c# myObject = myCollection[index]; myObject = myCollection.Item[index]; ```
trans-unit.target: 因此，下列程式碼是相等的︰```vb# myObject = myCollection(index) myObject = myCollection.Item(index) ``` ```c# myObject = myCollection[index]; myObject = myCollection.Item[index]; ```

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的項目以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the at the location specified by the index parameter.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所指定的位置 index 參數。

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or- index is equal to or greater than the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: -或-index 位於此集合中的相等或更高的項目數。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定的第一個出現<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref>從<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Remove method uses the information contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> to identify the item to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove 方法會使用包含在資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject>來識別要從集合中移除的項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject"> </xref>移除<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection"> </xref>。
